head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISBERG, JEROME L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISBERG, JEROME L.

block.p: WEISBERG--Jerome L. On October 13th, 2003 at age 79. Beloved husband of Norma. Loving father of Lauren and Brodie Seagrave. Adoring grandfather of Reed. A friend to many. Graveside services today, at 11 AM, Wellwood Cemetery, Pinelawn, L.I.

WEISBERG--Jerome L. Our dear cousin Jerry, a sweet, loving man, we'll always cherish your friendship and the wonderful times we spent together. You'll be greatly missed and will remain in our hearts forever. The Cowen family
